Text: Fulbright Jaworski LLP Corporate Compliance Seminar Thur sday October Directors Officers Liability How Do You Protect Your Companys Management and Board in a Changing Environment The downturn in the economy especially among technology companies and the recent tragic events in New York have created new challenges for corporate counsel and risk managers who are charged with protecting their companies officers and directors from liability This program will focus on the principal liability threat securities litigation and the shield for that threat Directors Officers Liability Insurance Securities Litigation How has the landscape changed what are the allegations who are the targets and what is the effect on damages and settlements Directors Officers Liability Insurance What is the current state of the market what recent changes in coverage have occurred how will these changes affect your company and what can you do about them Thursday October am The St Regis Hotel Briar Oaks Lane For more details or to register for this seminar click on the link below newsindexcfmfuseactionseminardetailarticleid siteidsubtypeEventsstTX This seminar is presented by Fulbright Jaworski LLP Marsh and National Economic Research Associates If you have questions contact Paul Schneidau by email at or by phone at
